page.title: 16Transport
page.content: The London Midland Railway used to run through Stanbridgeford Station but was closed in 1963 by the Beeching axe. There are two buses running through Totternhoe, via Eaton Bray, to Aylesbury. A bus runs daily to Leighton Buzzard through Stanbridge and Tilsworth from the A5 and from Luton through Totternhoe, Stanbridge and Tilsworth to Leighton Buzzard on market days. As the bus service is not comprehensive the majority of people rely heavily on private transport ie cars, motor cycles and bicycles. Outings are usually made by coach as the nearest railway stations are at Leighton Buzzard, Cheddington, Tring and Luton. Luton Airport fairly close by is available for air travel abroad.
